idea-plugin.name: Fast Java
idea-plugin.description:
Fast-Java-Plugin

fast-java-plugin is a fast code generation tool.both MySQL and MongoDB are supported.
support build #IU-181.*
Contains directories.
  • domain
  • controller
  • service
  • repository
  • service.impl
Why use Fast Java.
  • Filter out duplicate work that adds, deletes, corrects, and checks
  • Quickly realize add, delete, change and check business logic
  • Common service logic has strong compatibility
  • Tailor your code to your business logic
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Initialize fast-java-plugin the project, Version V1.0.1
  • Compression plug-in volume
  • Remove unnecessary dependencies
  • Simplify traditional business logic operations

action.description: Agile business development with on click
